title: Bug 2120MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: The Most Recently Used (MRU) file list is not persisted between sessions of the workbench. Upon restarting the workbench, the MRU file list is empty.
EB: The MRU file list should be persisted between sessions of the workbench. Upon restarting the workbench, the MRU file list should retain the previously accessed files.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Start the workbench. 2. Open 2 or 3 files. 3. Shutdown the workbench. 4. Restart the workbench and observe the MRU file list.
